ygData.subject: Re: Ranger-Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: Depends actually, If the rogue has SoW or you re grouped with a Bard, Ranger, Necro, Druid, etc that has a slow/snare affect.... you could catch them
ygData.messageBody:
Depends actually, <br><br>If the rogue has SoW or
you're grouped with a Bard, Ranger, Necro, Druid, etc
that has a slow/snare affect.... you could catch them
and backstab them. (Or you could use it for potential
monster control. One strat we use in groups sometimes is
to fear adds if we have no chanter.)<br><br>Course
the most interesting group I've ever heard about is a
friend of mine that used to play. (He quit about 2 years
back.) He used to get on an all rogue group around lvl
30 to 40. I even think this was back before they
invented Instill Doubt but I never played a rogue till
recently-- sooooo... not for sure on that
one.<br><br>Anyway, they used to gather around-- everyone
pickpocketed and backstabbed as often as possible. It was
truly sick amounts of damage. Mobs would just spin in
circles as agro switched to the one that just got
backstab off. But when 6 rogues have you
surrounded...someone can always backstab.<br><br>Fatedhue
Prismatic<br>Drinal Server-- The Tribunal of the Antiquities<br>Key
word, /who "The Tribunal". LOL<br>shooman out
